meanings.definition: The final section of the large intestine, ending at the anus.
meanings.sent1: The rectum is where waste waits before leaving the body.
meanings.sent2: After the large intestine, the rectum is the last stop before the anus.
meanings.sent3: Why did the food get stuck in the rectum? It's like a traffic jam in there!
meanings.sent4: His stubbornness was a blockage in the rectum of progress.
meanings.sent5: The rectum is like a storage room for poop, ready to be emptied.

meanings.definition: The part of the digestive system where feces are stored before being excreted.
meanings.sent1: Feces are kept in the rectum until it's time to go to the bathroom.
meanings.sent2: When the rectum is full, it's time to visit the toilet.
meanings.sent3: The rectum was so full, it felt like a balloon about to burst!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was building up in her like pressure in a rectum.
meanings.sent5: The rectum holds onto waste until the body is ready to release it.
